Summary: Floating disc shaped object moving slowly. Flashed several different lights around the circumference. Light grey shiny top.
divs: Sighting DetailsFloating disc shaped object moving slowly. Flashed several different lights around the circumference. Light grey shiny top. I felt very impressed and amazed. It continued on its straight path past a tree line, so I could no longer see it.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Warren
There were no other sightings in Warren on or around July 31st 2012
